channel.title: Items on death
channel.description:
Umm I recently downloaded a pk source (someone edited delta's source and made into a pk source) anyway, it's like old deltascape. When you die, ALL items are kept.
I would be very grateful if someone could explain how I would get items to drop on death.
Thanks. ;)
